LanguageData.VFE_AdvancedWindTurbine.label: вдосконалена вітрова турбіна
LanguageData.VFE_AdvancedWindTurbine.description: A spacertech, advanced wind-powered electrical generator. Requires a large clear space in front and behind for optimal air flow.
LanguageData.VFE_AdvancedWindTurbine_Blueprint.label: advanced wind turbine (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_AdvancedWindTurbine_Frame.label: advanced wind turbine (building)
LanguageData.VFE_AdvancedWindTurbine_Frame.descriptio: A spacertech, advanced wind-powered electrical generator. Requires a large clear space in front and behind for optimal air flow.
LanguageData.VFE_AdvancedSolarGenerator.label: вдосконалена сонячна панель
LanguageData.VFE_AdvancedSolarGenerator.description: This spacertech solar generator is capable of extracting significantly more energy from sunlight. Does not work in the dark or under artificial light.
LanguageData.VFE_AdvancedSolarGenerator_Frame.label: advanced solar generator (building)
LanguageData.VFE_AdvancedSolarGenerator_Frame.descrip: This spacertech solar generator is capable of extracting significantly more energy from sunlight. Does not work in the dark or under artificial light.
LanguageData.VFE_AdvancedWatermillGenerator.label: вдосконалений водний генератор
LanguageData.VFE_AdvancedWatermillGenerator.descripti: A spacertech building that produces electricity from a river. Must be placed with its wheel in moving water. If watermills are placed too close together, the turbulence they generate will interfere and reduce power generation.
LanguageData.VFE_AdvancedWatermillGenerator_Frame.des: A spacertech building that produces electricity from a river. Must be placed with its wheel in moving water. If watermills are placed too close together, the turbulence they generate will interfere and reduce power generation.
LanguageData.VPE_AdvancedGeothermalGenerator.label: вдосконалений геотермальний генератор
LanguageData.VPE_AdvancedGeothermalGenerator.descript: This advanced, spacertech generator produces electricity from geothermal steam geysers. Must be placed on a steam geyser.
LanguageData.VPE_AdvancedGeothermalGenerator_Frame.de: This advanced, spacertech generator produces electricity from geothermal steam geysers. Must be placed on a steam geyser.
